name: MediaAnalys
overview:
With a total of more than 10 years’ experience in the trade, MediaAnalys is one of the foremost companies in the field of search engine marketing. Using innovative solutions such as Search Engine Optimization and Sponsored links, we help modern companies to gain new customers via the Net.

The business concept at MediaAnalys is to deliver search engine marketing in whatever is the innovative digital media of the time. This could be search engine optimization of existing webpages, the purchase of advertising space on search engines and portals, or the construction of new websites aimed at attracting visitors to the customerâ€™s main website.

Furthermore, the business concept at MediaAnalys is about selling and supplying those services and tools than can be directly connected to monitoring the customer’s investment in search engine marketing. These might be statistical systems, systems that identify the visitors to a webpage, or other ancillary services. The business concept at MediaAnalys is not a constant and nor is it dependent on a particular search engine; rather, it will change with the times in step with developments in the market. In the future, other forms of Internet marketing, too, may become appropriate to expand the choice further â€“ this may be, for example, marketing by e-mail.

MediaAnalys have a presence in Kalmar, Helsingborg and Stockholm, and our goal during 2010 is to have 50 staff and to be doing search engine marketing for around 3500 customers. Our vision is to be the natural partner of choice when it comes to search engine marketing in Scandinavia, for large and small companies alike.
